name: no-bs-typescript-boilerplate
description: Simple Typescript boilerplate for writing modules
author: Jean M. Lescure

scripts.project:rename: echo 'New package name: ' && read NEW_NAME && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify({...require('package.json'), name: '$NEW_NAME', version: '0.0.1'}, null, 2));"
scripts.project:new: rm -rf dist static typings src .all-contributorsrc && mkdir src && touch src/index.ts && touch src/interfaces.ts && yarn project:rename
